name: cultivate-uw-ml-mvp
description: Machine Learning MVP for analyzing educator-child interactions in early childhood education

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:python && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:python && npm run format:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd demo && npm install && cd .. && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules demo/node_modules demo/dist venv/__pycache__ src/**/__pycache__
scripts.setup:env: python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt

author: Warren & Claude
